  <script type="text/javascript">
   if (window.location.hash &amp;&amp; window.location.hash == '#_=_') {
        window.location.hash = '';
    }
  </script>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   (function (i, s, o, g, r, a, m) {
        i['GoogleAnalyticsObject'] = r; i[r] = i[r] || function () {
            (i[r].q = i[r].q || []).push(arguments)
        }, i[r].l = 1 * new Date(); a = s.createElement(o),
        m = s.getElementsByTagName(o)[0]; a.async = 1; a.src = g; m.parentNode.insertBefore(a, m)
    })(window, document, 'script', '//www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js', 'ga');

    ga('create', 'UA-37066016-1', 'muhlenberg.edu');
    var pageTitle = "What&#39;s Open Now";
    if (pageTitle == 'Error Page') {
        /* Track generic Errors */
        var url = "/error/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '404 Error Page') {
        /* Track 404 Errors */
        var url = "/404/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else if (pageTitle == '500 Error Page') {
        /* Track 500 Errors */
        var url = "/500/?url=" + window.location.pathname + window.location.search + "&amp;from=" + document.referrer;
        ga('send', 'pageview', url);
    }
    else {
        ga('send', 'pageview');
    }
    /**
    * Function that tracks a click on an outbound link in Google Analytics.
    * This function takes a valid URL string as an argument, and uses that URL string
    * as the event label. Setting the transport method to 'beacon' lets the hit be sent
    * using 'navigator.sendBeacon' in browser that support it.
    */
    var trackOutboundLink = function (url) {
        ga('send', 'event', 'outbound', 'click', url, {
            'transport': 'beacon'
        });
    }
    $(function () {
        $('a[href*="http://"], a[href*="https://"]').each(function (index) {
            var currentOnClick = $(this).attr("onclick");
            if (currentOnClick === undefined || currentOnClick === null || currentOnClick === "") {
                var href = $(this).attr("href");
                $(this).attr("onclick", "trackOutboundLink('" + href + "');");
            }
        });
    });
  </script>
 </head>
 <body>
  <script type="text/javascript">
   $(document).ready(function () {
            $("#tabs").tabs();
            $("#register").click(function () {
                $("#login-fields").hide();
                $("#create-new").show();
                //            alert("Clicked register");
            });
            $("#already-registered").click(function () {
                $("#create-new").hide();
                $("#login-fields").show();
                //            alert("Clicked Already Registered");
            });
            $("#SignIn").click(
                function () {
                });
            //variable to reference window
            $myWindow = $('#openid-box');
            //instantiate the dialog
            $myWindow.dialog({
                height: 550,
                width: 700,
                modal: true,
                position: 'center',
                autoOpen: false,
                title: 'Join us - It\'s Free!!!',
                beforeclose: function (event) { return $("dlgclose"); }
            });
            $("#dayFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventToday");
            });
            $("#weekFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = '';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = 'none';
                //alert("eventWeek");
            });
            $("#monthFilter").click(function () {
                document.getElementById('eventToday').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventWeek').style.display = 'none';
                document.getElementById('eventMonth').style.display = '';
            });   
            var last = $("#nav #nav-stripe ul.pureCssMenu.pureCssMenum li.pureCssMenui0:last");
            last.hover(
		  function () {
		      var viewArea = $(window).width();
		      var offset = last.offset();
		      var outer = offset.left + 155;
		      var diff = "-88px"; //(viewArea - outer) + 'px';
		      if (viewArea &lt; outer) {
		          $(this).find("ul").css("left", diff);
		      }
		  },
		  function () {
		      $(this).find("ul").css("left", "0px");
		  }
	);
            //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing... 
        });
        //do not remove this line, it is used for later processing...
  </script>

   <div id="header-txt">
    By protecting and improving our environment, the communities where we do business and the students we serve, Muhlenberg Dining makes every day a better day and every tomorrow a better tomorrow.

     <div class="column-66 float-left">

      <noscript>
       This page requires javascript to work correctly
      </noscript>
      <h1>
       What's Open Now
      </h1>
      <p>
       Click a location to view hours
        or view
       <a href="/dining-choices/hoursofoperation.html">
        all service hours
       </a>
      </p>
      <div id="slider-time" data-initialval="963">
      </div>
      <div class="datediv">
       <label for="datepicker">
        Date:
       </label>
       <input type="text" id="datepicker" data-today="11/30/2016" value="11/30/2016" />
      </div>
      <div class="cleardiv">
      </div>
      <div id="slider">
      </div>
      <input type="hidden" id="isMobile" value="False" />
      <div id="opennow_none" style="display: none;">
       All locations currently closed or not open during the selected hours. Please see the
       <a href="/dining-choices/hoursofoperation.html">
        Hours of Operation
       </a>
       page to view service hours.
      </div>
      <div id="opennow_locations" class="desktopLocations">
       <div class="location desktopLocation even-Location">
        <div class="location_title">
         <a href="/dining-choices/index.html">
          Wood Dining Commons
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="opGroup desktopGroup" data-isdefault="False" data-groupfrom="8/29/2016" data-groupto="5/19/2017">

         </div>

        </div>
        <div class="opGroup desktopGroup" data-isdefault="False" data-groupfrom="8/29/2016" data-groupto="5/19/2017">
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Friday" data-opentime="660" data-closetime="1200">
          11:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday" data-opentime="660" data-closetime="1260">
          11:00 a.m. - 9:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Saturday" data-opentime="1080" data-closetime="1200">
          6:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Sunday" data-opentime="1080" data-closetime="1260">
          6:00 p.m. - 9:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday,Saturday,Sunday" data-opentime="-1" data-closetime="-1" data-closed="closed">
          Closed
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="opGroup desktopGroup" data-isdefault="False" data-groupfrom="11/22/2016" data-groupto="11/27/2016">
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Tuesday" data-opentime="660" data-closetime="840">
          11:00 a.m. - 2:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Sunday" data-opentime="1080" data-closetime="1260">
          6:00 p.m. - 9:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday,Saturday,Sunday" data-opentime="-1" data-closetime="-1" data-closed="closed">
          Closed
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="cleardiv">
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="location desktopLocation odd-Location">
        <div class="location_title">
         <a href="/dining-choices/life-sports-center-cafe.html">
          Life Sports Center Cafe
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="opGroup desktopGroup" data-isdefault="False" data-groupfrom="8/29/2016" data-groupto="5/19/2017">
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday" data-opentime="480" data-closetime="1200">
          8:00 a.m. - 8:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Saturday" data-opentime="780" data-closetime="1200">
          1:00 p.m. - 8:00 p.m.
         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday,Friday,Saturday,Sunday" data-opentime="-1" data-closetime="-1" data-closed="closed">

       <div class="location desktopLocation even-Location">

          Java Joe
         </a>
        </div>
        <div class="opGroup desktopGroup" data-isdefault="False" data-groupfrom="8/29/2016" data-groupto="5/21/2017">

         </div>
         <div class="opHours" data-applieddays="Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday" data-opentime="510" data-closetime="1200">

      <div class="opennow_disclaimer">
       *All times are local to this institution. (Eastern Standard Time)
